snippet.title: Ancient Mind - Steam Next Fest Mini Trailer
snippet.description:
Ancient Mind is a Zelda-inspired action adventure game coming in November 2024 to PC and mobile.

PLAY THE DEMO HERE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2376750/Ancient_Mind

Demo is now available to download and will be included in the Steam Next Fest 2024. Starting on February 5.

Follow the development:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/AncientMindGame
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@ancientmindgame
Mastodon - https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@HexagonNico

SUPPORT THE PROJECT: https://ko-fi.com/hexagonnico

Music:
Matthew Pablo - Beyond The Clouds Orchestral Theme (CC-BY-3.0)
